_metadata.description: Parameters for the AZ-305 Security & Governance Policy Initiative. Customize effects and values per environment.
_metadata.deployment_command: az deployment sub create --location eastus --template-file az305-policy-initiative.bicep --parameters az305-policy-initiative.parameters.json
_metadata.az305_exam_note: Understanding parameter files is essential. They allow you to reuse the same template across dev/test/prod with different enforcement levels. For example, use DoNotEnforce in dev and Default in prod.

enforcementMode._metadata_note: Set to DoNotEnforce for initial testing. Change to Default after reviewing compliance results. AZ-305 exam tip: Always start with DoNotEnforce to assess impact before enforcing.
